title: Artist Mentorship & Career Development
content: Guidance for young and emerging artists to grow their skills, confidence, and presence in the music industry.

title: Song Completion & Production
content: I help you finish your unfinished tracks with arrangement, lyrics, and production that give them a professional edge.

title: Music Branding & Promotion
content: Shape and promote your music project with professional branding, marketing, and audience-focused strategies.

title: Live Performances
content: Piano, Keyboard, singer, diverse genres and tailored to the occasion.

title: Session Musician
content: Get high-quality piano or keyboard recordings for your tracks, delivered with precision and creativity or include me in your songwriting team.

title: Private Music Lessons
content: Learn piano, keyboard, or music production with personalized lessons designed around your goals.

title: Interactive Music Entertainer
content: Bring energy and fun to your event with interactive, music-driven games and activities for all ages.

title: Academic Music Workshops, Lectures & Speaker on Music Topics
content: Workshops on songwriting, performance, production, and creativity in music.

title: Music Video Production
content: Turn your ideas into a fully written and composed original song that matches your style and story.
